verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name of the Lord. Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name, Blessed be the name of the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All praise to Him who reigns on high, In majesty supreme, Who gave His life for man to die, That He might man redeem.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His name above all names shall stand, Exalted more and more, At God the Father’s own right hand, Where angel hosts adore.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Redeemer, Savior, Friend of man Once ruined by the fall, Thou hast devised salvation’s plan, For Thou hast died for all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}His name shall be the Counsellor, The mighty Prince of Peace, Of all earth’s kingdoms, Conqueror, Whose reign shall never cease.{/lang-eng}
